name: Adriana Lucía
description: '''Adriana Lucía López Llorente'''{{family name footnote|López|Llorente|lang=Spanish}} (born 1982), known by the stage name '''Adriana Lucía''', is a Colombian singer. She has released nine albums since her debut ''Enamórate Como Yo'' at the age of 14, and has twice been nominated for a [[Latin Grammy]].
